query:
ALTER TABLE data_sync_jobs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS current_step VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS total_steps INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS current_step_index INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS progress_percent INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS site_progress JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute ALTER TABLE data_sync_jobs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS current_step VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS total_steps INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS current_step_index INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS progress_percent INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS site_progress JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
